reviewText:
I enjoyed the ova but I'm not too wild on the CGI.
I wold almost scream lazy, compared to the original. For me it looks a bit strange and fake but the animation indeed is fashionable.

Also watch the original if not familar because this is too much clumped together and because of it you are not given enough walkthrough to the character's realtionship with each other.
So its terribly rushed!!
Another crammed anime that delivers only flashy looks and not enough feeling and genuine pace within the anime.
By far to me the best anime is a good plot and stories and not so much vanity in apperaence.

Vast improvement over the first film. The CGI is cleaned up, and visually the movie is just much better. The voice acting for both the English and Japanese dubs are strong, as well as the soundtrack. My one pet peeve is that there is a lot left out from the original manga. The story of Griffith killing the queen is entirely passed over. All in all it's a great addition to the franchise and sets things up nicely for the eclipse.

i didn't know they rebooted the Berserk anime! i stumbled across this by accident and had to watch it. I'm a huge fan of the Berserk Manga series. this is different from the original manga series that came out. some details are different that they didn't show in the series, but did post in the comics.

I wish the story would continue in the manga tv series, minus the pirate boat sequences.
This would be a 5/5 if it wasn't for the overuse of CGI other than that great story and characters
Arc I through III are great

I wish I would've known the instant video was in English with no choice for Japanese and subtitles. I don't like watching anime in English. However, it wasn't too bad. Still prefer original language though.
Could follow a better adaption of the manga, but still good.
Still pretty good remake of the original nicer animation & visuals...but the story felt rushed and not as well told as the original series!
Should have made new anime series into movies..... Oh well
Great action. Great continuation of story.
Not as much action. But great character development. Animation is top notch.
It's all great and then at the end it throws you this curveball that goes from bad ass anime to "WTF am I watching" very quickly. HIGHLY recommend it!
